import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Bin from "../../multimedia/png/bin.png" import { deleteData } from "../../Services/CRUD" const TicketCard = ({data, id}) => { const handleDelete = async (id) => { await deleteData("tickets", id) } if(data.amount > 0) {

{data.subindex}

} } export default TicketCard
